description: Former FBI agent John Douglas, the inventor of criminal profiling, leads a journey into the minds of the 20th Century's most notorious killers, including Charles Manson, John Wayne Gacy, and Jeffrey Dahmer.
name: Serial Killers: Profiling the Criminal Mind

original_info.id: Serial Killers: Profiling the Criminal Mind_1994
original_info.name: Serial Killers: Profiling the Criminal Mind

review.name: Great to find out about real life crimes
review.reviewBody: I must say that I am not a crazed lunatic that is in love with serial killers. I am only interested in the subject of how and why they do it. This documentery takes you through the lives of John Gacy, Charels Manson who is actually interviewed with his followers and Jeffery Dahmer. It is very facinating on the great lengh of details and how they got the footage and interviews is beyond me. This is just a great film to teach us about our country's darkside. I bought this film because I was doing a project for school and it gave me a fistful of information I did not know about. Plus it also features on the way the FBI profiles the criminal mind which is also very facinating. I encourage anyone who like biographys to see this wonderful piece of work.
